Reform the Pell grant program

By tying the payments that colleges receive from Pell grants to graduation and employment, the schools would have a greater stake in their students’ success.

The resort casino in Connecticut is striving to keep its Massachusetts customers as the Bay State continues on the path toward having casinos of its own.
